extension.valueString: American Society of Clinical Oncology Author

name: ColorectalCancer
title: Colorectal Cancer
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses of colorectal cancer.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of primary colorectal cancer.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes secondary colorectal cancer.)
